title: Low priority queue
body: Wtf? I've just been placed in low priority queue for no reason! I had disconnected at the start but that was because the game had said I didn't have Wi-Fi but I was watching a stream whilst this was happening and that stream never disconnected. So now I have to wait 20 minutes for no reason. ._.

replies.body:
5 times even....
Wait till it crashes on you and doesn't let you back in a couple times after working fine for days,
and then after the 5th game has finished you're still in low Priority queue.
that's fun
